subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{lang|zh|士}} is commonly used to render the {{IPAchar|/s/}} sound (not followed by a vowel) in foreign names, e.g. {{zh-l|威士忌|[[whiskey|whi'''s'''key]]}}, {{zh-l|巴士|[[bus|bu'''s''']]}}, which is from Cantonese usage.
